content: How can I display all additional language displays in a code system with several levels (nested concepts)? In my case, it only displays those of level 1.
What is 'it'? Are you using the publisher? An 'expand' operation?

I'm using the publisher. And in the section 'Additional Language Displays' of the CodeSystem page are shown only the code and the translations (CS.concept.designation) of the concept in the first level. The defined translations of the nested concepts (e.g. CS.concept.concept.designation) aren't shown.
